TypeSignature.Value: public interface ITurnContext<T> : Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext where T : IActivity
.class public interface auto ansi abstract ITurnContext`1<(class Microsoft.Bot.Schema.IActivity) T> implements class Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext
Public Interface ITurnContext(Of T) Implements ITurnContext
type ITurnContext<'T (requires 'T :> IActivity)> = interface interface ITurnContext

Docs.typeparam: The activity type for this turn of the bot.
Docs.summary: Provides context for a turn of a bot, where the context's property is strongly typed.
Docs.remarks: The interface defines properties shared by every type of activity. The interfaces that derive from include properties specific to a specific type of activity. For example, includes properties associated with message activities, and includes properties associated with event activities.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Activity As T

Docs.summary: Gets the activity for this turn of the bot.
Docs.value: The activity for this turn of the bot.
